title: Find Closest Person
notes: Simple comparison problem using absolute difference. Compared distances between z and x (P1), and z and y (P2). Returned 1 if person at y is closer, 2 if x is closer, and 0 if tied. Clean implementation practice.

title: Roman to Integer
notes: Refreshed string-to-integer conversions using hash maps.Learned to look ahead in the string (e.g., "IV" = 4).Compared current and next Roman symbols to determine whether to add or subtract.Got more comfortable with character-by-character parsing.

title: Minimum Operations to Make the Integer Zero
notes: Learned how binary representations and bit_count() can be used to track number of 1's.Practiced range loops and conditions to simulate valid operations.
